title: [K-12] Adaptive Learning Activity Sequencing Strategy Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Three or More Years of Mathematics Teaching Experience or Foundational Knowledge in Pedagogy
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining individual device usage with collaborative activities among teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to use Sequencing Graphs to design conditional progression paths between learning activities.
Learners can propose three or more dynamic sequencing strategies based on learner performance data.
Learners can comparatively analyze activity sequencing implementation methods according to IMS Learning Design standards.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
